defaultJoinMessage.message: <@{MEMBER_ID}> has joined! Welcome to {GUILD_NAME}. We now have {GUILD_MEMBER_AMOUNT} members!

defaultLeaveMessage.message: <@{MEMBER_ID}> has left {GUILD_NAME}. We now have {GUILD_MEMBER_AMOUNT} members!

agreementEmbed.buttonError: These buttons only apply to the person who ran the command.
agreementEmbed.title: Yono Legal Douments
agreementEmbed.description: Thank you for using Yono, to continue using Yono you must agree to the latest Terms of Sevice, Privacy Policy, and Refund Policy. These can change at anytime without notice, please make sure to regularly check them.
agreementEmbed.agreedTrue: Thank you for agreeing to Yono's legal documents.
agreementEmbed.agreedFalse: To start using Yono, you must agree to the legal documents.

premiumEmbed.title: An error has occured while executing this command
premiumEmbed.description: You need to be a premium user to use these commands, to get preimum [Join our discord server](https://yonobot.co.uk/discord)

blacklistEmbed.title: Error has occured while running this command.
blacklistEmbed.description:
You are blacklisted from Yono, if you want to get unblacklisted, do the following steps:
> 1) Join our [Discord Server](https://yonobot.co.uk)
> 2) Apply the appeal form.

yonoIntroductionEmbed.title: Yono Help
yonoIntroductionEmbed.description:
Hey, My name is Yono im a multi-purpose discord bot! If you need help you can join our [Discord Server](https://yonobot.co.uk/invite) or [Check Our Website](https://yonobot.co.uk/).

 Don't know how to start? just run the following command:
> `{PREFIX}help`

ownerOnlyEmbed.title: Error has occured while executing this command
ownerOnlyEmbed.description: This command can only be used by the owner(s) of the bot

serverOnlyEmbed.title: Error has occured while executing this command
serverOnlyEmbed.description: This command can only be ran in servers. Command Name: {COMMAND_NAME}

directMessageOnlyEmbed.description: This command can only be ran in Direct Messages. Command Name: {COMMAND_NAME}

incorrectArgumentsEmbed.title: An error has occured while executing this command

messageReactionAdd.notInGuild: <@{MEMBER_ID}, you need to meet the set criteria in the giveaway. Please make sure you joined the required server to participate.

giveawayEnd.noValidEntries: There are no valid entries for the following giveaway: https://discord.com/channels/{CHANNELC_GUILD_ID}/{CHANNELC_ID}/{MESSAGEID}

noUsersInVoiceChannelEmbed.authorTitle: No members in my current voice channel.
noUsersInVoiceChannelEmbed.description: Yono will leave the voice channel within 60 seconds if nobody joins back.

timeElapsedEmbed.authorTitle: No members in my current voice channel.
timeElapsedEmbed.description: Yono will be leaving the voice channel as no one joined back within the 60 second mark.

queueEnd.queueEnded: Queue has been ended, please add more music otherwise Yono will leave in 15 minutes.
queueEnd.timeElapsed: Yono has left the Voice Channel since nothing has been played for over 15 minutes.

trackEnd.errorUnknown:
An error has occured while ending the track. Please provide this error to the developers.
 ```{ERROR_STACK}```

errorEmbed.authorTitle: An error has occured while playing.
errorEmbed.description:
Yono has ran into an error while playing: {TRACK_TITLE}. Please provide this error to the developers.
 ```{ERROR_STACK}```

trackError.errorUnknowm:
An error has occured while ending the track. Please provide this error to the developers.
 ```{ERROR_STACK}```

trackStart.errorUnknown:
An error has occured while ending the track. Please provide this error to the developers.
 ```{ERROR_STACK}```

stuckEmbed.description: The track got stuck while playing {TRACK_NAME} [{REQUEST_USER}], Yono will be automatically skipping to the next track.

trackStuck.unknownError:
An error has occured while ending the track. Please provide this error to the developers.
 ```{ERROR_STACK}```

pausedTooLongEmbed.authorTitle: The queue has been paused for too long.
pausedTooLongEmbed.description: Yono will leave the voice channel within 60 seconds if the queue is not unpaused.

timeElapsedEmbed.authorTitle: The queue has been paused for too long.
timeElapsedEmbed.description: The music has been paused for longer than 60 seconds after the warning, Yono has left the voice channel.

activiatedAndDeactivatedFeatures.loopActivated: Looping has been activiated for this playlist.
activiatedAndDeactivatedFeatures.loopDeactivated: Looping has been deactivated for this playlist.
activiatedAndDeactivatedFeatures.loopEnabled: Looping has been enabled for this playlist.

paginator.whichPageJump: What page would you like to go to? Say `cancel` or `0` to cancel the prompt. Your window to reply ends in 15 seconds.
paginator.pageNumTooHigh: The page to jump to must be less than or equal to {TOTAL_PAGES}. Please try again.
paginator.positiveRequired: The number of the page cannot be negative.
paginator.integerRequired: The number provided cannot be a decimal number.

help.description: Shows the help page which has all the information about the commands or about a specific command.

usage.description: Provides information about all of the bot's commands.
Provides help and information about the specified command.

cmdNotFound.title: Error has occured while running this command.
cmdNotFound.description: No information found for the following command:

embed.title: Yono Help Command
embed.descriptionDefault:
**Help Menu | Yono** Information, Support, and Commands:

{EMOJI_SUPPORT} **Information** :: Provides general & informative commands for bot, such as help, ping and many other commands.
{EMOJI_MODERATION} **Moderation** :: Every server needs moderation commands, keeping the server safe is a priority.
{EMOJI_UTIL} **Utility** :: Utility commands could come handy sometimes.
 {EMOJI_FUN} **Fun & Images** :: Fun commands are needed always.
 {EMOJI_GIVEAWAYS} **Giveaways** :: Create giveaways for your members, weather its with requirements or not.
 {EMOJI_MEMBER} **Invite Management** :: Track the invites and set welcome messages and more.
 {EMOJI_MUSIC} **Music** :: Play music from different platforms such as spotify.
embed.descriptionOne:
**Help Menu | Yono** Information, Support, and Commands:
{EMOJI_INFO} **Yono** bot is a multi purpose bot made for everyone, Yono (You only need one). Need help? Run the `{PREFIX}support` command to get support/contact links.

Sets a normal message welcome.

embed.title: This is a title
embed.description:
This is a description.

Use the buttons below to configure this embed.

objects.one: Type the text that will be added to the author title
objects.two: Type the link that will be added to the author icon
objects.three: Type the text that will be added to the title
objects.four: Type the link that will be added to thumbnail
objects.five: Type the text that will be added to the description
objects.six: Type the color to be added at the side of the embed.
objects.seven: Type the text that will be added to the file
objects.eight: Type the text that will be added to the footer text
objects.nine: Type the link that will be added to the footer icon

setjoinmessage.256CharMax: Please enter text shorter than 256 characters.
setjoinmessage.3000CharMax: Please enter text shorter than 3000 characters.
setjoinmessage.authorImgHasToBeLink: Author image has to be a link.
setjoinmessage.invalidColor: Invalid color, please include the color name or hex code, e.g. WHITE or #ffffff
setjoinmessage.invalidSyntax: Invalid syntax. You need a field name AND a field value. Please try again and seperate them using ` -f `. Example: `This is a field title -f This is a field value`
setjoinmessage.fieldMaxMin: The field name has to be less than 256 characters, the field description has to be less than 1000 characters
setjoinmessage.footerImgHasToBeLink: Footer icon has to be a link.
setjoinmessage.thumbnailImgHastoBeLink: Thumbnail has to be a link.
setjoinmessage.cancelled_RerunPopupOne: The embed builder has been cancelled, to rerun type:
setjoinmessage.buttonError: These buttons only apply to the person who ran the command.
setjoinmessage.variablesMsg: Use the variables below in a `/variable-name/` form when writing your text.
setjoinmessage.variables:
```inviter-id - Provides the ID of the inviter` 
 `inviter-tag - Gives the user's tag e.g. Moonlightt#2222` 
 `inviter-mention - Mentions the user that joined` 
 `inviter-invites-total - Provides the total invites for the inviter` 
 `inviter-invites-joins - Provides the joins for the inviter` 
 `inviter-invites-leaves - Provides the leaves for the inviter` 
 `inviter-invites-bonus - Provides the bonus for the inviter` 
 `user-id - Provides the ID of the user that joined` 
 `user-tag - Gives the user's tag e.g. Moonlightt#2222` 
 `user-mention - Mentions the user that joined` 
 `user-created-date - The creation date of the user that joined` 
 `user-joined-date - The date that the user joined the server in` 
 `invite-code - The invite code used to join` 
 `invite-channel - The channel the invite code was created in` 
 `invite-uses - The invite code uses` 
 `guild-name - The guild name` 
 `guild-membercount - The guild total membercount` 
 `user-av - The avatar of the user that joined` 
 `guild-av - The avatar of the guild` 
 `inviter-av - The avatar of the inviter```
setjoinmessage.tooLongToRespond: You took too long to respond, the embed builder has been cancelled.
setjoinmessage.option: Do you want this to be an embed or a normal message - [`embed` / `normal`]
setjoinmessage.1000CharMax: Please provide text less than 1000 characters.
setjoinmessage.set: The embed has been set up, and will be sent when a user leaves.

create.serverNotFound: Server was not found, make sure that you provide the server invite, then server ID first. Not fixed? Make sure the bot is in the other guild.
create.notGg: Invalid invite format, please make sure it includes: `discord.gg/`, or `discord.com/invite`
create.tooLong: You took too long to respond, the giveaway creation has been canceled.

questions.one: What is the time limit on your giveaway? s/m/h/d
questions.two: Which channel should the giveaway message be posted?
questions.three: What is the prize of the giveaway?
questions.four: How many winners should there be for this giveaway?
questions.five: What is the description of the giveaway? (Type N to skip)
questions.six: What are the required guild to be joined? Send the server ID then link. (Type N to skip)
questions.sixextra: Okay, now please enter the server link.
questions.seven: What are the required roles to have? (Type N to skip)
questions.eight: What roles have more enteries then other? (Type N to skip)

embed.title: Giveaway Message
embed.descriptionOne:
Please ensure that the following details are correct:

Prize:

list.description: Sends a list of active giveaway in the server.

usage.description: Gets the list of giveaways then sends it.

reroll.description: Rerolls a winner for a giveaway.

usage.description: Rolls the giveaway of the provided ID

reroll.noMsgId:
You need to give the message id.
Usage: .reroll [ message id ]
reroll.notFound: Giveaway not found, please make sure you insert a valid Giveaway ID and to be in the same channel as the giveaway message.
reroll.notEnded: This giveaway has not been ended yet.
reroll.noReactions: No one reacted to the giveaway.
reroll.msgOne: A new winner has been rolled! Congratulations

stop.description: Stops a giveaway in the server.

usage.description: Stops the giveaway of the provided ID

stop.noMsgId:
You need to give the message id.
Usage: .stop [ message id ]
stop.invalidGw: Invalid Giveaway ID, please make sure to provide the correct giveaway ID.

play.description:
Play a song/playlist or search for a song from youtube
Single track options: insert
Playlist options: shuffle, reverse, insert, select
Insert: inserts the track(s) to be next in queue.
Shuffle: shuffle the playlist before adding it to the queue.
Reverse: reverse the playlist before adding it to the queue.
Select: select a song from a playlist to add to queue.
`[]` indicates optional arguments, the positions of the arguments in the help command are showing valid argument positions. `|` means there are multiple possible arguments

usage.description: Play a song from search
Play a song from url
Play a playlist from url
Select a song from a playlist

play.noPermissionEmbedLinks: Yono is missing the required permissions to play music. Please provide the Embed Links permission.
play.notInVoiceChannel: You must be in a voice channel to play music.
play.noPermissionVoice: Yono is missing the required permissions to play usic. Please provide speaking permission.

errors.formatNotSupported: That is not a supported file extension supported extensions are `mp3`, `aac`, `wav`, `mp4`, `m4a`, `ogg`, `flac`, `mkv`
errors.noArguments: Please provide a song name or link to search.

unknownErrorEmbed.title: An error has occured while executing this command
unknownErrorEmbed.description:
An error has occured while ending the track. Please provide this error to the developers.
 ```{ERROR_STACK}```

leave.description: Leaves the voice channel and ends the current queue

usage.description: Leaves the current voice channel

leave.notInVoiceChannel: Yono is not in a voice channel in this guild to leave.
leave.userNotInVoiceChannel: Yono cannot leave since your not in any voice channel.
